SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: Barrier
SimEntity.Comment: A buoy which may be moving and effected by currents, wakes and tides.

Parameter.name: moverID
Parameter.Comment: Unique ID number for this object

Parameter.name: height
Parameter.Comment: Height in meters above the waterline

Parameter.name: rotation
Parameter.Comment: Orientation in radians about the (Z DIS axis (Y for X3D)) example: 0 0 1 1.57

StateVariable.name: proximitySensor
StateVariable.Comment: Sensor used to detect when movers are getting close to the pier and should consider it for navigation

Event.name: Run
Event.Comment: Initializes all state variables for each simulation run.

Event.name: Init
Event.Comment: Used by diskit.ScenarioManager to register all entities

Event.name: RegisterSensor
Event.Comment: Passes Sensor to Relay for Registration

Event.name: Detection
Event.Comment: Detects when a mover is getting close to this object

Argument.name: mover
Argument.Comment: Mover that is getting close to obstacle

Event.name: ObstacleClose
Event.Comment: Notification event that passes obstacle information to the detected mover. Also adds mover to the close contact queue.

Argument.name: mover
Argument.Comment: Mover who is close to this object

Argument.name: buoy
Argument.Comment: Object that may need to be avoided

Event.name: BarrierAttacked
Event.Comment: Scheduled by an entity who attempts to explode this object

Event.name: BarrierDestroyed
Event.Comment: Occurs when the barrier is attacked

LocalVariable.name: hiddenLocation
LocalVariable.Comment: If the barrier is destroyed move it below the sea level
